Articles.Content: The most famous challenge of this year 2016 is the Bottle challenge and it consist on do a flip on an bottle and needs to land up, but this challenge needs to do an flip in an rocket and land on the launch pad up and not fall. How to construct the simplest rocket to do an rocket to do the challenge: First start the core in an RC-L0, then down pu an FL-T400 and finally put an CR-7 R.A.P.I.E.R and you're done! Then do the challenge! Have fun!
Recording is still not playing nice, but here is my attempt

Couldn't get it to record so I made a gif -- it's a back-and-forth flip (positive 360 degree flip, then negative 360 degree flip, then landing) using the smallest command pod, three RT-5s, and six landing legs. Done in demo. I'll try to see whether I can get a launchpad landing, though the landing legs tend to clip through the pad and get stuck.

https://imgflip.com/gif/1h108m
